The Lost Road and Other Writings

wikitext.*:
'''Drûn''' was a region in [[Dorthonion]], located north of [[Tarn Aeluin]] and west of [[Ladros]].<ref name=Drun>{{WJ|Beleriand}}, ''Sheet 2 North-east'', p. 183</ref> 

The region was marked on [[the Second 'Silmarillion' Map]],<ref name=Drun/> on which the [[Map of Beleriand and the Lands to the North|map of Beleriand]] in the published ''[[Silmarillion]]'' was based upon.<ref>{{LR|A3}}, pp. 407-413</ref>

Apart from the mention of a "''fire in Drûn''" in the [[The Lay of Leithian Recommenced|revised ''Lay of Leithian'']],<ref>{{LB|4}}, "3. Of Beren son of Barahir & his escape", v. 520, p. 344</ref> nothing else is known about the region.
